title: *POND BUILD* for Florida Alligator Farm (Rec Pond Revealed)

tasks.task: Joining a community pond building event
subtasks: Greet participants and answer questions
Oversee construction of the 8x11 ecosystem pond
Collaborate with fellow contractors and newbies
Participate in alligator feeding demonstration
Mark out the pond area
Install filtration system components
Lay EPDM liner and underlayment
Excavate and shape the pond
Attach skimmer and prepare plumbing
Incorporate natural elements (waterfalls, driftwood, plant areas)
Ensure proper water flow and filtration
Approach alligator enclosure with caution
Use appropriate feeding mechanism or tool
Interact with trained staff to ensure safety

tasks.task: Participating in a pond construction team
subtasks: Digging and excavating the pond site
Laying EPDM liner and underlayment
Assembling filtration and plumbing systems
Positioning rocks, water features, and natural elements
Ensuring proper water circulation and aeration
Landscaping surrounding areas (e.g., planting, grading)
Collaborating with team members to achieve project goals
Maintaining safety during construction and interaction with wildlife

tasks.task: ** Joining a community pond building event
** Participating in a pond construction team
